system.description: Effect: Stuff Cheeks can only be used if the user has an equipped [Food] item, or is adjacent to a [Food] item. The user consumes the [Food] item and applies its effect immediately. Then, the user's DEF stage increases by +2 for 5 activations.

actions.name: Stuff Cheeks
actions.description: Effect: Stuff Cheeks can only be used if the user has an equipped [Food] item, or is adjacent to a [Food] item. The user consumes the [Food] item and applies its effect immediately. Then, the user's DEF stage increases by +2 for 5 activations.
